resources.string: The application plots any function or multiple functions on the same graph. Zooming/panning is supported. Also, minimum and maximum values of X or Y can be explicitly typed in options.

Add +
 Subtract -
 Multiply *
 Divide /
 Power ^
 Modulus %
 Factorial !

Functions can be typed by pressing the 'func' button on the custom keyboard.
 
 sqrt(): square root
 exp(): exponent
 sin(): sinus
 cos(): cosinus
 tg(): tangent
 ctg(): cotangent
 abs(): absolute value
 log(): logarithm decimal
 ln(): logarithm natural
 asin(): arcsinus
 acos(): arccosinus
 atan(): arctangent
 sh(): hyperbolic sinus
 ch(): hyperbolic cosinus

Find Extrema: calculates extrema of all drawn functions and shows them as dots on the graph.
 
 Find Roots: calculates roots of all drawn functions and shows them as dots on the graph.
 
 Find intersections: calculates all intersections of each pair of drawn functions and shows them as dots on the graph.
